author: neilg
msg: updating XMLReaderFactory to SAX 2.0 R2 Pr3 level.  This makes loading class parsers more robust, in way similar to the previous update of ParserFactory.  Note that this commit also addresses the two alternative methods for locating a default XMLReader that the new XMLReaderFactory provides--that is, an entry in META-INF/services is included, and the XMLReaderFactory defaults to our implementation if no other is found.

author: lmartin
msg: changes required because we use null for no uri in XNI
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: edwingo
msg: Fix validation switches so that they implement JAXP 1.2 proposed spec.  The
schema association w/ instance doc still needs to be implemented.

author: andyc
msg: 1) Updated samples to new XNI interfaces.
